trans-unit.source: Provides access to the properties needed to define a Message Queuing message.
trans-unit.target: 提供对定义消息队列消息所需的属性访问。

trans-unit.source: Use the Message class to peek or receive messages from a queue, or to have fine control over message properties when sending a message to a queue.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看或从队列接收消息，或能够很好的控制消息属性向队列发送消息时，请使用 Message 类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> uses the Message class when it peeks or receives messages from queues, because both the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods create a new instance of the Message class and set the instance's properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>使用 Message 类在扫视或接收来自队列的消息时，因为同时<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法创建的邮件类的新实例并设置该实例的属性。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>

trans-unit.source: The Message class's read-only properties apply to retrieving messages from a queue, while the read/write properties apply to sending and retrieving messages.
trans-unit.target: Message 类的只读属性适用于从队列检索消息时的读/写属性适用于发送和检索消息。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> peeks or receives a message from a queue, its <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A> property determines which of the message's properties are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>扫视或接收来自队列的消息其<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A>属性确定消息的属性中哪些检索。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> class's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A> method allows you to specify any object type for a message being sent to that queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>类的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>方法允许你指定的任何对象类型为发送到该队列的消息。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> instance's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> property to specify settings for generic messages sent to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>实例的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>属性指定的泛型消息发送到队列设置。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>

trans-unit.source: The types of settings include formatter, label, encryption, and authentication.
trans-unit.target: 类型的设置包括格式化程序、 标签、 加密和身份验证。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify values for the appropriate <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> members when you coordinate your messaging application to respond to acknowledgment and report messages.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指定的相应值<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>成员在协调消息传送应用程序以响应确认消息和报告消息时。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using a Message instance to send a message to the queue gives you the flexibility to access and modify many of these properties—either for a single message or on a message-by-message basis.
trans-unit.target: 使用消息实例来向队列发送一条消息可以灵活地访问和修改其中的许多属性-对单个消息或消息的消息的基础上。

trans-unit.source: Message properties take precedence over <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 消息属性优先于<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>.</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>

trans-unit.source: Message data is stored in the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property and to a lesser extent, the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AppSpecific%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 消息数据存储在<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>属性和较小的范围内，<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AppSpecific%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.AppSpecific%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: When message data is encrypted, serialized, or deserialized, only the contents of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property are affected.
trans-unit.target: 消息数据已加密、 序列化或反序列化的内容<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>属性会受到影响。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property are serialized when the message is sent, using the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> property you specify.
trans-unit.target: 内容<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>序列化属性，当使用发送消息时<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>你指定的属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: The serialized contents are found in the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在中找到的序列化的内容<xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A> property directly, for example, to send a file as the data content of a message.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置<xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A>属性直接，例如，若要将文件作为一条消息的数据内容发送。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> or <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> properties at any time before sending the message, and the data will be serialized appropriately when you call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>或<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>任何时间之前发送的消息和数据时的属性会进行序列化相应地调用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>.</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>时</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A></xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: The properties defined by the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property apply only to messages that are not of type Message.
trans-unit.target: 属性定义<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性仅适用于不属于类型消息的消息。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you specify the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> property for a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>, the identically named properties in a Message instance sent to that queue cause these default properties to be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>属性<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>中发送到该队列的消息实例, 具有相同名称的属性会导致这些默认属性被忽略。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of Message, see the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关的消息的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Messaging.Message.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Messaging.Message"></xref> class with an empty body.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Messaging.Message"></xref>正文为空类。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class that has an empty body.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载来创建的新实例<xref:System.Messaging.Message>具有空主体的类。</xref:System.Messaging.Message>

trans-unit.source: Specify either the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property or the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A> property before sending the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>属性或<xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A>属性在发送之前<xref:System.Messaging.Message>对象。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property can be any object that can be serialized, such as a text string, a structure object, a class instance, or an embedded object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>属性可以是任何可序列化的对象，例如文本字符串、 结构对象、 类实例或嵌入的对象。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A> property, set the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> property before you send the message.
trans-unit.target: 除非你将写入消息的内容直接<xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A>属性，设置<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>属性后，发送消息。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The body is serialized using the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> property's value at the time the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> instance.
trans-unit.target: 正文将序列使用<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>属性的值时<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>实例。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter> is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>松散耦合的因此不需要具有相同的对象时使用此格式类型上的发送者和接收者。</xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> and <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> serialize the data into binary representation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>和<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>数据序列化为二进制表示形式。</xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> </xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> is used when sending or receiving COM components.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>发送或接收 COM 组件时使用。</xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Messaging.Message"></xref> class, using the <xref href="System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter"></xref> to serialize the specified object into the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Messaging.Message"></xref>类，使用<xref href="System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter"></xref>将指定的对象序列化为消息的正文。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class that contains the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> specified by the `body` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载来创建的新实例<xref:System.Messaging.Message>类，该类包含<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>指定的`body`参数。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message>

trans-unit.source: The `body` parameter can be any object that can be serialized, such as a text string, a structure object, a class instance, or an embedded object.
trans-unit.target: `body`参数可以是任何可序列化，如文本字符串、 结构对象、 类实例或嵌入的对象的对象。

trans-unit.source: The body is serialized using the <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter> unless you change the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> property before the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> is sent.
trans-unit.target: 正文将序列使用<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>除非您更改<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>属性之前<xref:System.Messaging.Message>发送。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> or <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> property at any time before calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>, the message will be serialized according to the new property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>或<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>属性之前调用的任何时候<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>，消息会根据新的属性值进行序列化。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter> is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>松散耦合的因此不需要具有相同的对象时使用此格式类型上的发送者和接收者。</xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> and <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> serialize the data into binary representation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>和<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>数据序列化为二进制表示形式。</xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> </xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> is used when sending or receiving COM components.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>发送或接收 COM 组件时使用。</xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The object to be serialized into the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化到消息的正文的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Messaging.Message"></xref> class using the specified formatter to serialize the specified object into the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Messaging.Message"></xref>类使用指定的格式化程序将指定的对象序列化为消息的正文。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class that contains the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> specified by the `body` parameter and that uses any valid formatter to serialize the body.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载来创建的新实例<xref:System.Messaging.Message>类，该类包含<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>指定的`body`参数且使用任何有效的格式化程序进行序列化正文。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message>

trans-unit.source: The `body` parameter is any object that can be serialized, such as a text string, a structure object, a class instance, or an embedded object.
trans-unit.target: `body`参数是可序列化，如文本字符串、 结构对象、 类实例或嵌入的对象的任何对象。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> or <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> property at any time before calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>, the message will be serialized according to the new property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>或<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>属性之前调用的任何时候<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>，消息会根据新的属性值进行序列化。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter> is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>松散耦合的因此不需要具有相同的对象时使用此格式类型上的发送者和接收者。</xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> and <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> serialize the data into binary representation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>和<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>数据序列化为二进制表示形式。</xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> </xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> is used when sending or receiving COM components.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>发送或接收 COM 组件时使用。</xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The object to be serialized into the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化到消息的正文的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Messaging.IMessageFormatter"></xref> that specifies the formatter with which to serialize the message body.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Messaging.IMessageFormatter"> </xref> ，指定用来序列化消息正文的格式化程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of acknowledgment message to be returned to the sending application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置确认消息返回给发送应用程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: The AcknowledgeType property specifies the type of acknowledgment messages requested by the sending application.
trans-unit.target: AcknowledgeType 属性指定发送应用程序请求的确认消息的类型。

trans-unit.source: Set the AcknowledgeType property before sending the message to request notification of certain occurrences—for example, a message reaching its destination queue, a message being retrieved, or a time-out preventing a message from reaching or being retrieved from the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: 在发送消息来请求特定事件的通知之前设置 AcknowledgeType 属性 — 例如，消息到达其目标队列、 正在检索消息或超时妨碍到达或正在从目标队列检索消息。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing returns notification by sending acknowledgment messages to the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A> property specified by the original message.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列的确认将消息发送到返回通知<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A>指定原始消息属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: An acknowledgment message's <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A> property indicates the type of acknowledgment that it represents.
trans-unit.target: 确认消息的<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A>属性指示确认它所表示的类型。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if an acknowledgment message was sent because a message did not reach the destination before the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A> interval expired, the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A> property of the acknowledgment message would contain the value `ReachQueueTimeout`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果发送确认消息，因为消息未到达之前目标<xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A>间隔过期，<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A>的确认消息的属性将包含值`ReachQueueTimeout`。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes"></xref> values, which represent both the types of acknowledgment messages the system posts in the administration queue and the conditions under which acknowledgments are returned to the sending application.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes"></xref>表示的确认消息中的管理队列并在其下确认返回到发送应用程序的条件时，系统开机的这两种类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The message is filtered to ignore the AcknowledgeType property.
trans-unit.target: 消息筛选以忽略 AcknowledgeType 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the classification of acknowledgment that this message represents.
trans-unit.target: 获取此消息表示的确认的分类。

trans-unit.source: When you receive a message from an administration queue, read the Acknowledgment property to verify the status of the original message.
trans-unit.target: 当你将收到来自管理队列时，读取确认属性以验证原始消息的状态。

trans-unit.source: When a message is sent to its destination queue, Message Queuing can be requested to post an acknowledgment message.
trans-unit.target: 当消息发送到其目标队列时，消息队列可以请求将数据发送确认消息。

trans-unit.source: Such a message can indicate, for example, whether the message arrived and was retrieved within specified time-outs, or it can indicate what went wrong in the case of delivery failure.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用消息到达并被检索在指定超时值，也可能表明发生了什么错误传递失败的情况下，可以指示此类消息。

trans-unit.source: The destination queue returns acknowledgment messages and posts them to the administration queue specified in the original message's <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 目标队列返回确认消息，并将其发布到原始消息中指定的管理队列<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A> property of an acknowledgment message identifies the acknowledgment message, not the original message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>的确认消息的属性标识的确认消息，不是原始消息。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can find the identifier of the original message in the acknowledgment <xref:System.Messaging.Message> instance's <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在该确认找到原始消息的标识符<xref:System.Messaging.Message>实例的<xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message>

trans-unit.source: If this <xref:System.Messaging.Message> instance represents an acknowledgment message, the Acknowledgment property specifies the type of acknowledgment.
trans-unit.target: 如果此<xref:System.Messaging.Message>实例表示的确认消息，确认属性指定的确认类型。</xref:System.Messaging.Message>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the Acknowledgment property contains the value `Normal`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，确认属性将包含值`Normal`。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A> property of the original message to specify the circumstances under which acknowledgments will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A>以指定将在其下返回确认的情况的原始消息的属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Messaging.Acknowledgment"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Messaging.Acknowledgment"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The message has not been sent.
trans-unit.target: 尚未发送消息。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be read on messages retrieved from a queue.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可以在从队列中检索的消息上读取。

trans-unit.source: -or- The message queue is filtered to ignore the <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Acknowledgment*> property.
trans-unit.target: -或-消息队列筛选以忽略<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Acknowledgment*>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Acknowledgment*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the queue that receives the acknowledgement messages that Message Queuing generates.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置接收消息队列生成的确认消息的队列。

trans-unit.source: The queue specified in the AdministrationQueue property can be any non-transactional queue.
trans-unit.target: AdministrationQueue 属性中指定的队列可以是任何非事务性队列。

trans-unit.source: The acknowledgment messages sent to the administration queue can indicate whether the original message reached its destination queue and whether it was removed from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 发送到管理队列的确认消息可以指示原始消息是否到达其目标队列以及是否已从队列中已删除。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A> property has any value other than `None`, the sending application must specify the queue to use as the administration queue.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A>属性以外的任何值`None`，发送应用程序必须指定要用作管理队列的队列。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueue"></xref> that specifies the administration queue used for system-generated acknowledgment messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueue"> </xref> ，它指定用于系统生成的确认消息的管理队列。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The message queue is filtered to ignore the AdministrationQueue property.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列筛选以忽略 AdministrationQueue 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets additional, application-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置、 应用程序特定的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: The AppSpecific property contains application-specific information that you can use to organize different types of messages.
trans-unit.target: AppSpecific 属性包含可用于组织不同类型的消息的应用程序特定信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use application-specific indexes.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用应用程序特定的索引。

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the application to interpret AppSpecific property information.
trans-unit.target: 它负责要解释 AppSpecific 属性信息的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, you should include message data in the body of the message rather than the AppSpecific property.
trans-unit.target: 只要有可能，应将消息数据包含的消息，而不是 AppSpecific 属性正文中。

trans-unit.source: When working with foreign queues, use the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A> property to specify message properties that do not exist in Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: 在使用外部队列，使用<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>属性指定在消息队列中不存在的消息属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>

trans-unit.source: As with the AppSpecific property, it is the responsibility of the application to understand the content of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因为与 AppSpecific 属性，它是要了解的内容的应用程序的责任<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>

trans-unit.source: Information that is specific to the application.
trans-unit.target: 特定于应用程序的信息。

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为零。

trans-unit.source: The message queue is filtered to ignore the AppSpecific property.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列筛选以忽略 AppSpecific 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time that the message arrived in the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: 获取消息到达目标队列的时间。

trans-unit.source: The message's <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A> property indicates how quickly the message must be received from the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: 消息的<xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A>属性指示必须从目标队列收到的消息的速度。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A> property timer starts when the message is sent, not when the message arrives in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A>属性计时器将开始发送消息，不在消息到达队列中时。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the message's arrival time in the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>表示消息的到达目标队列的时间。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The time is adjusted from GMT to the local time of the computer on which the destination queue resides.
trans-unit.target: 该时间从格林威治标准时间调整为目标队列所驻留的计算机的本地时间。

trans-unit.source: The message has not been sent.
trans-unit.target: 尚未发送消息。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be read on messages retrieved from a queue.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可以在从队列中检索的消息上读取。

trans-unit.source: -or- The message queue is filtered to ignore the ArrivedTime property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-消息队列筛选以忽略 ArrivedTime 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the sender ID should be attached to the message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否发件人 ID 应附加到消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A> property is an array of bytes that represents the identifier of the sending user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A>属性是表示发送用户的标识符的字节数组。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The sender ID is set by Message Queuing and is used by the receiving Queue Manager to verify whether the sender has access rights to a queue.
trans-unit.target: 发件人 ID 由消息队列设置，并且用于通过接收队列管理器来验证发件人是否有权访问队列。

trans-unit.source: The absence of the sender ID is an indication by the sending application that Message Queuing should not validate the message's sender nor verify the sender's access rights to the receiving queue.
trans-unit.target: 发件人 ID，则发送应用程序，消息队列应不验证消息的发件人，也不验证发件人的访问权限表示缺少权限到接收队列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A> is trustworthy only if the message was authenticated when it reached the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A>值得仅当消息已验证时它已达到目标队列。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is rejected when it reaches the destination queue if the queue accepts only authenticated messages and either the <xref:System.Messaging.DefaultPropertiesToSend.UseAuthentication%2A> or the <xref:System.Messaging.DefaultPropertiesToSend.AttachSenderId%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列接受仅经过身份验证的消息，并且如果到达目标队列时被拒绝<xref:System.Messaging.DefaultPropertiesToSend.UseAuthentication%2A>或<xref:System.Messaging.DefaultPropertiesToSend.AttachSenderId%2A>属性是`false`。</xref:System.Messaging.DefaultPropertiesToSend.AttachSenderId%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.DefaultPropertiesToSend.UseAuthentication%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > If a message is rejected, it is either sent to the dead-letter queue (if <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A> is `true`), or it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 如果被拒绝消息，它或者被发送到死信队列 (如果<xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A>是`true`)，或它将被忽略。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can request acknowledgments when a message fails to reach a queue.
trans-unit.target: 当一条消息未能到达队列时，你可以请求确认。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, when <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A> is `false` the message might be lost without warning.
trans-unit.target: 否则为在<xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A>是`false`消息可能会丢失而不发出警告。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId*> should be attached to the message; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId*>附加到消息; 否则为应为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The message queue is filtered to ignore the AttachSenderId property.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列筛选以忽略 AttachSenderId 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the message was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示消息是否已验证。

trans-unit.source: The Authenticated property is used only by the application while it is interacting with the message and trying to determine if authentication was requested.
trans-unit.target: 它是与消息交互，并尝试确定是否已请求身份验证时，只能由应用程序使用身份验证属性。

trans-unit.source: If the message is in the queue, the message was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 如果消息已在队列中，消息已验证。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, if the Authenticated property is `true`, the receiving Queue Manager authenticated the message when it received that message.
trans-unit.target: 相反，如果已通过身份验证属性为`true`，接收队列管理器身份验证消息，当收到该消息。

trans-unit.source: You cannot determine if a message failed authentication by looking at its properties.
trans-unit.target: 无法确定消息是否未通过查看其属性通过身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing discards messages that fail authentication before they are delivered to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列丢弃身份验证失败之前它们传递到队列的消息。

trans-unit.source: However, you can request that an acknowledgment message be sent if a delivery failure prevents the message from arriving in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以请求如果传送失败防止消息到达队列中，会发送确认消息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if authentication was requested for the message when it entered the queue; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果其输入队列; 已请求消息身份验证，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The message has not been sent.
trans-unit.target: 尚未发送消息。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be read on messages retrieved from a queue.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可以在从队列中检索的消息上读取。

trans-unit.source: -or- The message queue is filtered to ignore the Authenticated property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-消息队列筛选若要忽略的身份验证属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the cryptographic provider used to generate the digital signature of the message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于生成消息的数字签名的加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: You typically use the AuthenticationProviderName when working with foreign queues.
trans-unit.target: 使用外部队列时，通常可以使用 AuthenticationProviderName。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing requires the authentication provider name and authentication provider type of the cryptographic provider (authentication provider) to validate the digital signatures of both messages sent to a foreign queue and messages passed to Message Queuing from a foreign queue.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列需要的身份验证提供程序名称和加密服务提供程序 （身份验证提供程序） 来验证发送到外队列的消息和从外队列传递到消息队列的消息的数字签名的身份验证提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: When sending a message, always set the AuthenticationProviderName and <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: 发送邮件时，始终设置 AuthenticationProviderName 和<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>属性组合在一起。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the message is sent, Message Queuing ignores the authentication provider name if the connector type is not also set.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接器类型还未设置，发送消息，消息队列将忽略身份验证提供程序名称。

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationProviderName property cannot be `null`, but it can be an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: AuthenticationProviderName 属性不能为`null`，但它可以是空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The name of the cryptographic provider used to generate the digital signature of the message.
trans-unit.target: 用于生成消息的数字签名的加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider version 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider 1.0 版。

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationProviderName property could not be set.
trans-unit.target: 无法设置 AuthenticationProviderName 属性。

trans-unit.source: -or- The message queue is filtered to ignore the AuthenticationProviderName property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-消息队列筛选以忽略 AuthenticationProviderName 属性。

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationProviderName was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: AuthenticationProviderName 已设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of cryptographic provider used to generate the digital signature of the message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于生成消息的数字签名的加密提供程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: You typically use the AuthenticationProviderType property when working with foreign queues to specify which cryptographic service provider is associated with a message.
trans-unit.target: 你通常用于 AuthenticationProviderType 属性使用外部队列时指定的加密服务提供程序是与消息关联。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing requires the authentication provider name and authentication provider type of the cryptographic provider (authentication provider) to validate the digital signatures of both messages sent to a foreign queue and messages passed to Message Queuing from a foreign queue.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列需要的身份验证提供程序名称和加密服务提供程序 （身份验证提供程序） 来验证发送到外队列的消息和从外队列传递到消息队列的消息的数字签名的身份验证提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: Only `RsaFull` is intended to be used with messaging.
trans-unit.target: 仅`RsaFull`旨在与消息一起使用。

trans-unit.source: When sending a message, always set the AuthenticationProviderType and <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: 发送邮件时，始终设置 AuthenticationProviderType 和<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>属性组合在一起。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the message is sent, Message Queuing ignores the authentication provider type if the connector type is not also set.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接器类型还未设置，发送消息，消息队列将忽略的身份验证提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Messaging.CryptographicProviderType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Messaging.CryptographicProviderType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_RSA_FULL" name="RSA_FULL" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_RSA_FULL" name="RSA_FULL" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationProviderType property could not be set.
trans-unit.target: 无法设置 AuthenticationProviderType 属性。

trans-unit.source: -or- The message queue is filtered to ignore the AuthenticationProviderType property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-消息队列筛选以忽略 AuthenticationProviderType 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置消息的内容。

trans-unit.source: The message's Body property usually contains the data associated with the message.
trans-unit.target: 消息的正文属性通常包含与消息关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: Although you can also send application-specific data in the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AppSpecific%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A> properties, you should include message data in the Body of the message whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 虽然你还可以发送应用程序特定数据<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AppSpecific%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>属性，您应尽可能消息的正文中包含消息数据。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.AppSpecific%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only the Body property contents are serialized or encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 序列化或加密正文的属性内容。

trans-unit.source: The Body property can contain any object whose size does not exceed 4 MB.
trans-unit.target: Body 属性可以包含任何对象，其大小不超过 4 MB。

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to send any object that is not of type <xref:System.Messaging.Message> to the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>, that object will be located in the Body property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> instance returned by <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A?displayProperty=fullName>发送程序的类型<xref:System.Messaging.Message><xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>，该对象将位于<xref:System.Messaging.Message>实例返回<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A></xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A></xref:System.Messaging.Message>的 Body 属性</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue></xref:System.Messaging.Message>不是任何对象</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The string argument in `MessageQueue.Send("hello.")` is an example of such a generic object.
trans-unit.target: 中的字符串自变量`MessageQueue.Send("hello.")`是一个示例是一般的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyType%2A> property indicates the type of information that is stored in the message body.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyType%2A>属性指示消息正文中存储的信息的类型。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing uses this information to identify the type of the Body property contents.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列使用此信息来标识的正文属性内容类型。

trans-unit.source: Specify either the Body property or the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A> property before sending the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定正文属性或<xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A>属性在发送之前<xref:System.Messaging.Message>对象。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Body property can be any serializable object, such as a text string, structure object, class instance, or embedded object.
trans-unit.target: Body 属性可以是任何可序列化对象，例如文本字符串、 结构对象、 类实例或嵌入的对象。

trans-unit.source: Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A> property, set the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> property before you send the message.
trans-unit.target: 除非你将写入消息的内容直接<xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A>属性，设置<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>属性后，发送消息。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> instance, the body is serialized using the formatter contained in the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>实例，正文使用序列化格式化程序中包含<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you send the message without specifying a value for the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> property, the formatter defaults to <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你发送消息时未指定<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>属性，则格式化程序默认为<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>.</xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter></xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>的值

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Attempting to set the body of a message to <xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue> will cause a <xref:System.OverflowException> when the `Send` method of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> class is called and the <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> is used.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 正在尝试设置到的消息正文<xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue>将导致<xref:System.OverflowException>时`Send`方法<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>类称为和<xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>使用。</xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> </xref:System.OverflowException> </xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the message contents.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定消息内容的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object can be a string, a date, a currency, a number, an array of bytes, or any managed object.
trans-unit.target: 对象可以是字符串、 日期、 货币、 数字、 字节，数组或任何托管的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter*>

trans-unit.source: -or- The message queue is filtered to ignore the Body property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-消息队列筛选若要忽略的 Body 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the information in the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置消息的正文中的信息。

trans-unit.source: The body of a message can consist of any type of information—for example, a string, a date, a currency, a number, an array of bytes, or any managed object.
trans-unit.target: 一条消息的主体可以包含的任何类型的信息 —，字符串、 日期、 货币、 数字、 字节，数组或任何托管的对象。

trans-unit.source: This information is serialized into a <xref:System.IO.Stream> to be passed to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 此信息序列化为<xref:System.IO.Stream>要传递给队列。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Specify either the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property or the BodyStream property before sending the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>属性或 BodyStream 属性在发送之前<xref:System.Messaging.Message>对象。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property, the contents are serialized into the BodyStream property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>属性，内容序列化到 BodyStream 属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can choose to write the BodyStream property directly.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以选择将数据直接写入 BodyStream 属性。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to open a connection to a file and stream its contents as the body of your message.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，例如，如果想要打开的连接到文件并将其内容序列作为你的消息的正文。

trans-unit.source: Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the BodyStream property, set the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> property before you send the message.
trans-unit.target: 消息的内容直接写入 BodyStream 属性，除非设置<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>属性后，发送消息。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> instance, the body is serialized using the formatter contained in the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>实例，正文使用序列化格式化程序中包含<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you send the message without specifying a value for the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A> property, the formatter defaults to <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你发送消息时未指定<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>属性，则格式化程序默认为<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>.</xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter></xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A>的值

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A> property to `true` for the body of this message, the message will be encrypted when it is sent, not when you set the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A>属性`true`为此消息的正文，消息将被加密发送时，不是在你设置时<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the BodyStream property is never encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 因此，永远不会进行加密 BodyStream 属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> that contains the serialized information included in the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body*> of the message.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.Stream>包含中包含的序列化的信息<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body*>的消息。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body*> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The message queue is filtered to ignore the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body*> property.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列筛选以忽略<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body*>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of data that the message body contains.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置消息正文所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing recognizes the body contents as an object or as a serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列会将正文内容视为一个对象或序列化的流。

trans-unit.source: The BodyType property indicates the type of the object within the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property of the message.
trans-unit.target: BodyType 属性指示中的对象的类型<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>消息的属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter> performs binding between native types and the object in a message body.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>完成消息正文中本机类型与对象之间的绑定。</xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>, the formatter sets the BodyType property for you.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>，格式化程序会为您设置 BodyType 属性。</xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: Other formatters can provide binding functionality also, as shown in the following C# code.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如下面的 C# 代码中所示，其他格式化程序可以提供绑定功能。

trans-unit.source: The message body's true type, such as a string, a date, a currency, or a number.
trans-unit.target: 消息正文的 true 类型，如字符串、 日期、 货币、 或数字。

trans-unit.source: The message queue is filtered to ignore the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body*> property.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列筛选以忽略<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body*>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that some message properties typically set by Message Queuing were set by the sending application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，表示一些通常由消息队列设置的消息属性已由发送应用程序设置。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing requires the ConnectorType property be set whenever an application sets a message property that is usually set by Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列要求 ConnectorType 属性将设置只要应用程序设置通常由消息队列设置的消息属性。

trans-unit.source: An application typically uses a ConnectorType in the following two cases: - Whenever a connector application passes a message.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常在以下两种情况下使用 ConnectorType:-每当连接器应用程序将消息传递。

trans-unit.source: The ConnectorType tells the sending and receiving applications how to interpret the security and acknowledgment properties of the message.
trans-unit.target: ConnectorType 告知发送和接收应用程序如何解释消息的安全性和确认属性。

trans-unit.source: - Whenever the sending application, rather than Message Queuing, encrypts a message.
trans-unit.target: -每当发送应用程序，而不是消息队列，加密消息。

trans-unit.source: The ConnectorType tells Message Queuing to use the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationSymmetricKey%2A> property value to decrypt the message.
trans-unit.target: ConnectorType 通知消息队列使用<xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationSymmetricKey%2A>属性值来对消息进行解密。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationSymmetricKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must set the ConnectorType property if you set any of the following properties (otherwise, the queue ignores these properties when the message is sent): - <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderName%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderType%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationSymmetricKey%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DigitalSignature%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.Message.MessageType%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A>
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了任何以下属性，必须设置 ConnectorType 属性 （否则，队列将忽略这些属性在发送邮件时）:- <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderName%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderType%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationSymmetricKey%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DigitalSignature%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.Message.MessageType%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A></xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.MessageType%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.DigitalSignature%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationSymmetricKey%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderType%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> defined by the application and used in conjunction with connector applications or message encryption.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Guid>由应用程序定义，并与连接器应用程序或消息加密结合使用。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Guid> allows a receiving application to interpret message properties that were set by the sending application but that are usually set by Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Guid>允许接收的应用程序来解释由发送应用程序设置，但通常设置的消息队列的消息属性。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The message queue is filtered to ignore the ConnectorType property.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列筛选以忽略 ConnectorType 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message identifier used by acknowledgment, report, and response messages to reference the original message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置确认、 报告和响应消息用以引用原始消息的消息标识符。

trans-unit.source: When Message Queuing generates an acknowledgment or report message, it uses the correlation identifier property to specify the message identifier of the original message.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列生成确认或报告消息时，它将使用相关标识符属性来指定原始消息的消息标识符。

trans-unit.source: In this manner, the correlation identifier ties the report or acknowledgment message to the original message.
trans-unit.target: 这种方式，相关标识符就将报表或确认消息与原始消息关联起来。

trans-unit.source: The sending application can then match the acknowledgment or report with the original message by using the CorrelationId property to identify the original message's <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 发送应用程序然后可以进行匹配将确认或报告与原始消息通过使用 CorrelationId 属性标识原始消息的<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: Connector applications also must set the CorrelationId property of the acknowledgment and report messages to the message identifier of the original message.
trans-unit.target: 连接器应用程序还必须设置确认和报告消息的 CorrelationId 属性为原始消息的消息标识符。

trans-unit.source: When your application sends a response message to the sending application, you can set the CorrelationId property of the response message to the message identifier of the original message.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序将响应消息发送到发送应用程序，可以将响应消息的 CorrelationId 属性设为原始消息的消息标识符。

trans-unit.source: The sending application can then match your response message to the message that was sent.
trans-unit.target: 然后，发送应用程序可以将响应消息与已发送的消息进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: The message identifier specified by the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id*> property of the original message.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定的消息标识符<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id*>原始消息的属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The correlation identifier is used by Message Queuing when it generates an acknowledgment or report message, and by an application when it generates a response message.
trans-unit.target: 相关标识符由消息队列时它会生成确认或报告消息，而应用程序时使用它将生成响应消息。

trans-unit.source: The message queue is filtered to ignore the CorrelationId property.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列筛选以忽略 CorrelationId 属性。

trans-unit.source: The CorrelationId is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: CorrelationId 是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the intended destination queue for a message.
trans-unit.target: 获取一条消息的预期的目标队列。

trans-unit.source: The DestinationQueue property is most commonly used to determine the original destination of a message that arrived in a journal or dead-letter queue.
trans-unit.target: DestinationQueue 属性通常用于确定到达日记队列或死信队列的消息的原始目标。

trans-unit.source: Usually, you do not need to examine this property, because you typically retrieve the message from its destination queue.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，你不必检查此属性，因为通常从其目标队列检索消息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueue"></xref> that specifies the intended destination queue for the message.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueue"> </xref> ，它指定消息的预期的目标队列。

trans-unit.source: The message has not been sent.
trans-unit.target: 尚未发送消息。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be read on messages retrieved from a queue.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可以在从队列中检索的消息上读取。

trans-unit.source: -or- The message queue is filtered to ignore the DestinationQueue property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-消息队列筛选以忽略 DestinationQueue 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the symmetric key used to encrypt application-encrypted messages or messages sent to foreign queues.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对称密钥用于加密应用程序加密的消息或发送到外部队列的消息。

trans-unit.source: Two scenarios require you to use the DestinationSymmetricKey property.
trans-unit.target: 两种方案需要使用 DestinationSymmetricKey 属性。

trans-unit.source: The first is when your application, rather than Message Queuing, encrypts a message.
trans-unit.target: 第一种是当你应用程序，而不是消息队列，对消息进行加密。

trans-unit.source: The second is when you send an encrypted message to a queuing system other than Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: 第二个是当将加密的消息发送到以外消息队列的队列系统。

trans-unit.source: Before you set this property, you must encrypt the symmetric key with the public key of the receiving queue manager.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性之前，必须对接收队列管理器的公共密钥的对称密钥进行加密。

trans-unit.source: When you send an application-encrypted message, the receiving queue manager uses the symmetric key to decrypt the message before sending it to its destination queue.
trans-unit.target: 当你发送应用程序加密的消息时，接收队列管理器使用对称密钥对消息发送到其目标队列之前进行解密。

trans-unit.source: If you send a message to a foreign queue, the message is first received by the appropriate connector application, which forwards the encrypted message with the attached symmetric key to the receiving application.
trans-unit.target: 如果向外队列发送一条消息，将加密的消息转发到接收应用程序的附加对称密钥与相应的连接器应用程序先接收消息。

trans-unit.source: It is then the responsibility of the receiving application to decrypt the message using the symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它是接收应用程序中，可以对消息使用的对称密钥进行解密的责任。

trans-unit.source: When you set the DestinationSymmetricKey property, you must also set the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当设置 DestinationSymmetricKey 属性时，你还必须设置<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the message is sent, Message Queuing ignores the DestinationSymmetricKey property if the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A> property is not also set.
trans-unit.target: 发送消息，消息队列会忽略 DestinationSymmetricKey 属性如果<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>还未设置属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DestinationSymmetricKey property has a maximum array size of 256.
trans-unit.target: DestinationSymmetricKey 属性具有的最大数组大小为 256。

trans-unit.source: An array of byte values that specifies the destination symmetric key used to encrypt the message.
trans-unit.target: 指定用来加密消息的目标对称密钥的字节值数组。

trans-unit.source: The default is a zero-length array.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为零长度数组。

trans-unit.source: The message queue is filtered to ignore the DestinationSymmetricKey property.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列筛选以忽略 DestinationSymmetricKey 属性。

trans-unit.source: The DestinationSymmetricKey is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: DestinationSymmetricKey 是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the digital signature that Message Queuing uses to authenticate the message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置消息队列用于对消息进行身份验证的数字签名。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing uses the digital signature when authenticating messages that were sent by Message Queuing version 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 已发送的消息队列版本 1.0 的消息进行身份验证时，消息队列将使用数字签名。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, Message Queuing generates and sets the DigitalSignature property when the sending application requests authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，消息队列生成，并在发送应用程序请求身份验证时设置 DigitalSignature 属性。

trans-unit.source: The receiving application uses this property to retrieve the digital signature attached to the message.
trans-unit.target: 接收应用程序使用此属性来检索附加到消息的数字签名。

trans-unit.source: You can only use the DigitalSignature property when running Message Queuing version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: 运行消息队列 2.0 版时，你可以只使用 DigitalSignature 属性。

trans-unit.source: The sending application must specify Message Queuing version 1.0 signatures when requesting authentication.
trans-unit.target: 请求身份验证时，发送应用程序必须指定消息队列 1.0 版签名。

trans-unit.source: If the sending application sends a Message Queuing version 2.0 signature, this property contains a buffer of four bytes, each containing zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果发送应用程序发送的消息队列 2.0 版签名，此属性将包含四个字节，每个包含零的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The DigitalSignature property, together with the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderCertificate%2A> property, is also used by connector applications when a message is sent.
trans-unit.target: DigitalSignature 属性，与一起<xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderCertificate%2A>属性，也使用连接器应用程序发送一条消息时。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderCertificate%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the connector application—rather than Message Queuing—generates the digital signature, which it bases on the certificate of the user sending the message.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，连接器应用程序，而不是消息队列-生成的数字签名，它将根据发送消息的用户的证书。

trans-unit.source: The DigitalSignature property has a maximum array size of 256.
trans-unit.target: DigitalSignature 属性具有的最大数组大小为 256。

trans-unit.source: When you set the DigitalSignature property, you must also set the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当设置 DigitalSignature 属性时，你还必须设置<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a message is sent, Message Queuing ignores the DigitalSignature property if the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A> property is not also set.
trans-unit.target: 在发送一条消息，消息队列会忽略 DigitalSignature 属性如果<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>还未设置属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of byte values that specifies the Message Queuing 1.0 digital signature used to authenticate the message.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于对消息进行身份验证的消息队列 1.0 数字签名的字节值数组。

trans-unit.source: The default is a zero-length array.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为零长度数组。

trans-unit.source: The message queue is filtered to ignore the DigitalSignature property.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列筛选以忽略 DigitalSignature 属性。

trans-unit.source: The DigitalSignature property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: DigitalSignature 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encryption algorithm used to encrypt the body of a private message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于加密私有消息的正文的加密算法。

trans-unit.source: If a message is private (encrypted), it is encrypted before it is sent and decrypted upon receipt.
trans-unit.target: 如果消息是私有 （加密），则消息前发送和在接收时解密被加密。

trans-unit.source: The EncryptionAlgorithm property specifies the algorithm used to encrypt the message body of a private message.
trans-unit.target: EncryptionAlgorithm 属性指定用于加密私有消息的消息正文的算法。

trans-unit.source: A queue can require that incoming messages be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 队列可以要求该传入消息进行加密。

trans-unit.source: If an application sends a non-encrypted (non-private) message to a queue that accepts only private messages, or if it sends a private message to a queue that accepts only non-private messages, the queue rejects the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序的非加密 （非专用） 消息发送到的队列，只接受私有消息，或如果它将私有消息发送到队列，只接受非私有消息，队列将拒绝该消息。

trans-unit.source: The sending application can request that a negative acknowledgment message be returned in such a case.
trans-unit.target: 发送应用程序可以请求，这种情况下会返回否定确认消息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Messaging.EncryptionAlgorithm"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Messaging.EncryptionAlgorithm"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_RC2" name="RC2" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_RC2" name="RC2" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The message queue is filtered to ignore the EncryptionAlgorithm property.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列筛选以忽略 EncryptionAlgorithm 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets additional, application-defined information associated with the message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与消息关联的、 应用程序定义的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: The Extension property provides for application-defined information, like a large binary object, that is associated with the message.
trans-unit.target: 扩展属性提供有关应用程序定义的信息，如与消息关联的大型二进制对象。

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the receiving application to interpret the contents of the Extension property.
trans-unit.target: 它负责接收应用程序来解释扩展属性的内容。

trans-unit.source: Where possible, you should include message data in the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property of the message rather than the Extension property.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，应包含在消息数据<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>的消息，而不是扩展属性的属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: When working with foreign queues, use the Extension property to specify message properties that do not exist in Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: 在使用外部队列，用于扩展属性指定不存在的消息属性在消息队列中。

trans-unit.source: A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: 非 Microsoft 消息队列的队列系统中不存在外队列。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application.
trans-unit.target: 与此类通过连接器应用程序的队列，消息队列进行通信。

trans-unit.source: An array of byte values that provides application-defined information associated with the message.
trans-unit.target: 提供与消息关联的应用程序定义的信息的字节值数组。

trans-unit.source: The default is a zero-length array.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为零长度数组。

trans-unit.source: The message queue is filtered to ignore the Extension property.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列筛选以忽略扩展属性。

trans-unit.source: The Extension property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 扩展属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formatter used to serialize an object into or deserialize an object from the message body.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于序列化到对象或反序列化消息正文中的对象格式化程序。

trans-unit.source: Use the Formatter property when reading and writing a message.
trans-unit.target: 使用格式化程序属性时读取和写入一条消息。

trans-unit.source: When a message is sent to the queue, the formatter serializes the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property into a stream that can be sent to the message queue.
trans-unit.target: 当消息发送到队列时，序列化格式化程序<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>属性转换成可以发送到消息队列的流。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: When reading from a queue, the formatter deserializes the message data into the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当从队列中读取，格式化程序反序列化到消息数据<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A> property, set the Formatter property before you send the message.
trans-unit.target: 除非你将写入消息的内容直接<xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A>属性，格式化程序前设置属性，你将消息发送。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.BodyStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> instance, the body is serialized using the formatter contained in the Formatter property.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>实例，正文使用序列化格式化程序属性中包含的格式化程序。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you send the message without specifying a value for the Formatter property, the formatter defaults to <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: 如果发送消息时未指定格式化程序属性的值，则格式化程序默认到<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>。</xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter> is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>松散耦合的因此不需要具有相同的对象时使用此格式类型上的发送者和接收者。</xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> and <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> serialize the data into binary representation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>和<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>数据序列化为二进制表示形式。</xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> </xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> is used when sending or receiving COM components.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>发送或接收 COM 组件时使用。</xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Messaging.IMessageFormatter"></xref> that produces a stream to be written to or read from the message body.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Messaging.IMessageFormatter"> </xref>生成可写入或读取从消息正文的流。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Formatter property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hashing algorithm that Message Queuing uses when authenticating a message or creating a digital signature for a message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置哈希消息队列在消息进行身份验证时使用的算法或创建一条消息的数字签名。

trans-unit.source: On the source computer, Message Queuing uses the hashing algorithm when creating a digital signature for a message.
trans-unit.target: 在源计算机上消息队列使用的哈希算法时创建一条消息的数字签名。

trans-unit.source: The target Queue Manager then uses the same hashing algorithm to authenticate the message when it is received.
trans-unit.target: 目标队列管理器然后使用相同的哈希算法时将会收到该消息进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Messaging.HashAlgorithm"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Messaging.HashAlgorithm"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: For Windows XP, the default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_SHA" name="SHA" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 对于 Windows XP 中，默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_SHA" name="SHA" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_MD5" name="MD5" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 否则，默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_MD5" name="MD5" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The message queue is filtered to ignore the HashAlgorithm property.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列筛选以忽略 HashAlgorithm 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the message's identifier.
trans-unit.target: 获取消息的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing generates a message identifier when the message is sent.
trans-unit.target: 发送消息时，消息队列会生成消息标识符。

trans-unit.source: The identifier is composed of 20 bytes and includes two items: the machine <xref:System.Guid> of the sending computer and a unique identifier for the message on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 标识符由 20 个字节组成，包括两个项︰ 机<xref:System.Guid>发送计算机和计算机上消息的唯一标识符。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The combination of the two items produces a message identifier that is unique on the network.
trans-unit.target: 两个项组合在一起产生了一个网络是唯一的消息标识符。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing generates message identifiers for all messages—including acknowledgment and report messages.
trans-unit.target: 消息队列会生成的所有消息的消息标识符 — 包括确认消息和报告消息。

trans-unit.source: An acknowledgment message is generally sent by Message Queuing in reaction to the arrival or failure of an original, sent message.
trans-unit.target: 确认消息通常由消息队列发送响应的到达或失败的原始、 发送消息。

trans-unit.source: You can find the Id property value of the original message in the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A> property of an acknowledgment message.
trans-unit.target: 你可以查找中的原始消息的 Id 属性值<xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A>的确认消息的属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Id property when sending a response message to a response queue.
trans-unit.target: 将响应消息发送到响应队列时，你还可以使用 Id 属性。

trans-unit.source: To include the identifier of the original message in a response message, set the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A> property of the response message to the Id property of the original message.
trans-unit.target: 若要将响应消息中包含的原始消息的标识符，设置<xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A>的响应消息写入原始消息的 Id 属性的属性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application reading the response message can then use the correlation identifier of the response message to identify the original message.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以在读取响应消息的应用程序中使用响应消息的相关标识符来标识原始消息。

trans-unit.source: The message's unique identifier, which is generated by Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: 消息的唯一标识符，由消息队列生成。

trans-unit.source: The message has not been sent.
trans-unit.target: 尚未发送消息。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be read on messages retrieved from a queue.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可以在从队列中检索的消息上读取。

trans-unit.source: -or- The message queue is filtered to ignore the Id property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-消息队列筛选若要忽略的 Id 属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that no time-out exists.
trans-unit.target: 指定不存在超时。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A> require a value that specifies a time-out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A>需要一个值，指定超时。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A></xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the former, the time-out is the maximum time allowed for a message to be received from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 对于前者，超时是允许从队列接收消息的最长时间。

trans-unit.source: For the latter, the time-out is the time allowed for a message to reach the queue.
trans-unit.target: 对于后者，该超时是消息到达队列所允许的时间。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, you can specify the time-out as a number of seconds or use InfiniteTimeout to indicate that no time-out exists.
trans-unit.target: 在这两种情况下，你可以为的秒数指定的超时，或使用 InfiniteTimeout，指示无超时存在。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the message was the first message sent in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示消息是否已在事务中发送的第一个消息。

trans-unit.source: Receiving applications use the IsFirstInTransaction property to verify that a message was the first message sent in a single transaction to a single queue.
trans-unit.target: 接收应用程序使用 IsFirstInTransaction 属性以验证消息已发送到单个队列单个事务中的第一个消息。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only with Message Queuing version 2.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是仅适用于消息队列版本 2.0 及更高版本。

trans-unit.source: To verify transaction boundaries, you can use the IsFirstInTransaction property along with two other properties: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.IsLastInTransaction%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证事务边界，你可以使用 IsFirstInTransaction 属性以及其他两个属性︰<xref:System.Messaging.Message.IsLastInTransaction%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A>。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.IsLastInTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the former to check whether a message was the last message sent in the transaction, and use the latter to retrieve the identifier of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 前者用于检查消息是否已在该事务中发送的最后一条消息，并使用后者来检索事务的标识符。

trans-unit.source: If only one message is sent in a transaction, the IsFirstInTransaction and <xref:System.Messaging.Message.IsLastInTransaction%2A> properties are both set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果只在事务中，IsFirstInTransaction 发送一条消息和<xref:System.Messaging.Message.IsLastInTransaction%2A>属性都设置为`true`。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.IsLastInTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was the first message sent in a transaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果消息已发送在事务; 中的第一个消息否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The message has not been sent.
trans-unit.target: 尚未发送消息。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be read on messages retrieved from a queue.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可以在从队列中检索的消息上读取。

trans-unit.source: -or- The message queue is filtered to ignore the IsFirstInTransaction property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-消息队列筛选以忽略 IsFirstInTransaction 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the message was the last message sent in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示消息是否已在事务中发送的最后一条消息。

trans-unit.source: Receiving applications use the IsLastInTransaction property to verify that a message was the last message sent in a single transaction to a single queue.
trans-unit.target: 接收应用程序使用 IsLastInTransaction 属性以验证消息已发送到单个队列单个事务中的最后一条消息。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only with Message Queuing version 2.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是仅适用于消息队列版本 2.0 及更高版本。

trans-unit.source: To verify transaction boundaries, you can use the IsLastInTransaction property along with two other properties: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.IsFirstInTransaction%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证事务边界，你可以使用 IsLastInTransaction 属性以及其他两个属性︰<xref:System.Messaging.Message.IsFirstInTransaction%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A>。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.IsFirstInTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the former to check whether a message was the first message sent in the transaction, and use the latter to retrieve the identifier of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 前者用于检查消息是否已在该事务中发送的第一个消息，并使用后者来检索事务的标识符。

trans-unit.source: If only one message is sent in a transaction, the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.IsFirstInTransaction%2A> and IsLastInTransaction properties are both set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果只在事务中，发送一条消息<xref:System.Messaging.Message.IsFirstInTransaction%2A>和 IsLastInTransaction 属性都设置为`true`。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.IsFirstInTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was the last message sent in a single transaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果消息已在单个事务; 发送最后一条消息否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The message has not been sent.
trans-unit.target: 尚未发送消息。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be read on messages retrieved from a queue.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可以在从队列中检索的消息上读取。

trans-unit.source: -or- The message queue is filtered to ignore the IsLastInTransaction property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-消息队列筛选以忽略 IsLastInTransaction 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an application-defined Unicode string that describes the message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置描述消息的应用程序定义 Unicode 字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can use a message label for several purposes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用消息标签有多种用途。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use it for display purposes or to selectively process messages based on the label value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，这样一你将可以使用它用于显示目的，或有选择地处理消息的标签值。

trans-unit.source: The label does not need to be unique across messages.
trans-unit.target: 标签不必是唯一的消息范围内。
